title: Spare hours...
author: Brown, John
snippet: Stoneywood called to the miller's man to cross with the boat. " And wha' are ye ? " "I 'm James Jamieson o' Little Mill," one of his own farmers. " Jamieson " was a ready joke on his father's name.
